text: After reading good health reviews on this product I ordered some to use in cooking. I had my doubts because my husband never has liked coconut. I tried a Tbsp mixed in a sweet potato with some cinnamon and it was great but I just put cinnamon in my husband's sweet potato. After he saw how much I enjoyed my sweet potato with the yummy coconut oil, he said he might give it a try next time I used it. This morning I made oatmeal, adding a Tbsp of coconut oil. He loved it. He said, "This tastes so good, it must be bad for you." I can't wait to try it next time I cook chicken.
